name: "Little One, Great Hero!"
description: A simple yet attractive notice board adorned with graffiti featuring you, Paimon, and Little One. Mr. Qax had it placed to deter Saurian smugglers and alert passing travelers.\nThe first step in combating the Saurian poacher syndicate begins with the installation of these signs. One day, may they spread throughout all of Natlan, making Saurian and animal trafficking a crime of the past!
